storyInfo: Spokesman McKee and the Candle Knight are discussing knight particulars, and Maria is talking with everyone about her sister's duel with Młynar. And in the Infected quarter, the Infected knights are right in the middle of planning something.

attributes.content: Greetings, Madam Droste... What are you reading there?
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: A wayside poetry anthology, Mr. McKee.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Ah... you've always been keen on the like.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: I still remember my first time seeing you, stood in that blood-soaked arena with the stench of iron, carrying a book like this too. Your surroundings were every bit out of place with you.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: You recall the details quite vividly, it seems...?
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Ah... haha, ashamed as I am to admit, I'm one of your fans too. If you're not busy, I must have you sign something.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: It would be my greatest honor.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Excuse me, Mr. McKee.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: I'll leave the wine you requested right here.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Thank you. Send my regards to the other staff.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Let's take a moment to celebrate, Madam Droste.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: I would be dearly happy to.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: A toast!
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: A toast.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: *sigh* Truly, a fine wine. It's a coveted Gaulish bottling, and its value would boggle any mind. A worthy tipple for a day such as today...
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: And for a knight such as you.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: You flatter me. I've simply been of good fortune.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: This poetry anthology...
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Authored by a poet of little name from my hometown. I very much adore the verses he pens.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Ah, a Leithanian anthology... the title means 'Twin Moons and Marigold'?
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Your Leithanian is superb as ever.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Haha, it was simply necessary to learn for diplomacy. I'm guessing you like marigolds? We've very few Kazimierzians nowadays who know how to appreciate poetry.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: In the end, the letter can't break free of our mind's eye. These are all but marks for imaginations.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: To the contemporary man, poetry is no more than warrens of words lacking aesthetics, too self-assuming, too pretentious.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Perhaps Kazimierzians are accustomed to a different sort of consumption now, a kind poetry could never match. It's a very typical course of things.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Might you be... insinuating?
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: I'm merely discussing poetry, Mr. McKee.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Don't you have something else you'd like to talk to us about, Madam?
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Oh... I wonder what.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Ah. Your new glasses suit you very well.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Haha... w-well, it's sharp of you to notice such things. What a surprise, haha...
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: *ahem* However, that's not quite relevant to you. No, there's been some prior rumors going around the intercity net and print presses...
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Ah... The red wine baths?
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Yes, it's been slandering your reputation...
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Do people really bathe in red wine? Wouldn't it stick to them so?
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Excuse me? I assume... I'm not sure.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: *sigh*... And who would believe such news?
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Some would, Madam Droste... many would believe it. Sure as they know it may not be the truth, they'll still let the information color them.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Could we not clear the air?
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Ah, you always do take non-knightly matters too lightly...
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: I've gotten in touch with the Rose Paper Union HQ; it turned out to be some entertainment editor's doing.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: It seems it had already drawn considerable attention by the time it was noticed, and with all the factors at play, no retraction came...
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: This is the way they work. I give them no mind.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: You're very forgiving, but that strengthens my feeling you've been wronged.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: You've donated practically all your income to the poor of Leithanien, to build schools back home, to set up nomadic platforms.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: But even if you deny the rumors now, the masses know the taste of delirium already, and they won't care what the truth is.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Hurting and slandering are simple things. They'll grab hold of the rumors and spread the news.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: And how many times have you seen, after the truth came out, those who'd worked against you turned to help you wash away the lies, to make the facts clear?
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Gossip can be fresh and exciting to people, while the truth is an all too boring thing. By all rights, this is how it is.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: *sigh* How are you so unconcerned?!
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Others should see an example in an upstanding, honorable knight like you! This ought to be better for your reputation, and besides—
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: McKee.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Erk...
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: I'm touched.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: You're all too thoughtful a person... and all too tender.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: As a Chamber spokesman, ensuring no external factors are of disturbance to any knight is part of my duty.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: That said, I'd like you to care more, please, about what happens to you.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Oh, I have a question for you.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: When will we have the competition schedule?
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: *sigh*... How can not even your own matches concern you?
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Provided nothing happens, your next opponent will be Graybeard Knight, followed by... the Radiant Knight.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Are you that shocked, Madam?
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Of course. The Radiant Knight, Margaret Nearl... I've heard this name many, many times. Such beauty, firmness, and grace too.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: The Chamber wishes you victory.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Mm... and yet...
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: A 'Candle' to the 'Radiant.' What chance do I have of winning?
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Don't be like that. Knight titles nowadays are more for catchiness than anything else. They've got nothing to do with true power, Madam Droste.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: You're very strong.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Oh—I've won!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Dammit! You cheater!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Ahahah, ol' V's still top of his game~♪ You're the big fat loser tonight, Kowal~♪
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: You belched on purpose calling 'start,' didn't you?!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Put the stool down, Kowal, that one's not built good. Get another one.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: I win, Kowal~♪ You big fat loser~♪
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: What did I walk in on?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Arm wrestling. What are you carrying there?
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Some medicine I just picked up...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Oh, for Młynar?
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: But he'll turn me the other cheek, I know that. Besides, I don't even think he'll start taking it on time...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: They couldn't be more different, personality-wise. But there are some areas where he and the sisters are very much alike.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I heard him and Margaret had a real, proper duel once. Margaret won.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Who knows, maybe that's how you wake Młynar up some.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Pfeh, I don't reckon that boy's got anything to wake up to. He's awake as can be. Too awake, he is. That's what turned him so funny these days.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Oh, Młynar...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: ...No, never mind.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Hi, everyone! Oh, Zofia's here too.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Maria? What are you doing here alone?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Someone came looking for Margaret just now, so I came over ahead of her.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: There aren't a lot of cases where someone's been exiled and then allowed to return as a full citizen. They need to check over so many legal documents...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Funny, that. Their bunch went to hell and back to catch Margaret out, and now they welcome her back with open arms?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Plotting something, aren't they?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: That's what was haunting me before. Can't you two talk something nice for once?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: We're just worried, you know...
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: If things really do go belly-up, we'll pack our bags and leave Kazimierz, head to that... Drohes Island whatsit to take a looksee.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: ...Rhodes. Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Maria, how's your uncle?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Ah... I think Uncle Młynar's still at work. His shift might be over soon?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: The Radiant Knight gave that boy a harsh talking-to, didn't she?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Hah, been a long time coming. If Old Man Nearl was still around, he wouldn't have stood for Młynar letting himself go like this—
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Maria?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: My sister could only make her return to the field because Młynar lost that duel. He's not going to have much more to say now.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Oho. So Młynar knows when to admit defeat, then?
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: But—But when they dueled, he didn't even use the slightest bit of Arts until the end...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: What? Was he throwing that one?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Scared to go all out, gave himself an excuse for losing? That's my sad reckoning.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Of course not. Admitting defeat, throwing? What makes you think he'd do something like that?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: He... he just can't stand Margaret. He can't stand the Radiant Knight.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: He didn't deem her worthy of using his full Arts, pure and simple. Nothing else.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: 'Ashlock' Greynuty, have you seen Sona?
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: She's right over there... Why is my name the only one you put the title on?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: ...I can stop.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: If you don't like it... I just felt—it's the impression you gave me.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: ...Whatever.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Sona!
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Whaaat—?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Come on! Everyone's here!
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Hup—
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Alright, alright. Are you all better now?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: My wounds won't get in the way... What's that? A figurine?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Ahaha, I'm a girl of my own, right? Is it so wrong to like cute things?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Sona...
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Okay, I get it. No leeway for jokes right now.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: 'Industrial accidents' are on the rise. They're herding the Infected about, terrorizing them and the slums alike.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Seeing as the Armorless Union's dropped all pretenses, hiding away's not an option anymore.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Szewczyk gave us some very interesting information. We need to hurry and—
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: —Sona?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: You seem kind of distracted.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: If one day... we win our freedom...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: ...what would you like to do then?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: We'll cross that bridge when we come to it. We'll think about it together.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: What's with you today...? Why so melancholy all of a sudden?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Ahaha, nothing. C'mon, hop to it.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Let's go meet Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub's new members.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Seems it's nearly all Infected here.
attributes.name: A Weathered Knight

attributes.content: The National Council could be watching, right?
attributes.name: A Hoarse Knight

attributes.content: The Council don't hide when they're watching, and in the worst case, we just throw some money around. Money's the key to getting the law on your side.
attributes.name: A Weathered Knight

attributes.content: But if this keeps up... will the Armorless Union stand by and let it happen?
attributes.name: A Weathered Knight

attributes.content: The Armorless Union? Do they even really exist?
attributes.name: A Hoarse Knight

attributes.content: Best not doubt them. You'll be wiser for it.
attributes.name: A Weathered Knight

attributes.content: Oh, look over there, the ones coming over. They must be the Pinus Sylvestris knights.
attributes.name: A Weathered Knight

attributes.content: Huh. They look like a bunch of kids, at a glance.
attributes.name: A Weathered Knight

attributes.content: But... maybe some things, only the young can do.
attributes.name: A Weathered Knight

attributes.content: 'Flametail' Sona.
attributes.name: A Hoarse Knight

attributes.content: 'Ashlock' Greynuty.
attributes.name: A Hoarse Knight

attributes.content: 'Fartooth' Justyna.
attributes.name: A Hoarse Knight

attributes.content: (Loud beeping noises)
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: Huh. I thought they had another one, a Kuranta...?
attributes.name: A Hoarse Knight

attributes.content: Are we going to even make it through alive, if we jump on board with these kids' plans? And if we do, what then? What about next month? Next year?
attributes.name: A Weathered Knight

attributes.content: There's something Infected often say, my friend. It all depends on you.
attributes.name: A Hoarse Knight

attributes.content: We've got Oripathy. Plenty choose to resign themselves to that... our lives will be short, and they could end at any moment.
attributes.name: A Hoarse Knight

attributes.content: But at the same time, my thinking is that's no guarantee we'll die tomorrow. As long as we've got so many 'tomorrows' lined up in front of us, we should damn well be taking them, fangs out.
attributes.name: A Hoarse Knight

attributes.content: Our numbers are dropping.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: We won't be able to save the Infected like this, Sona.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: I know. That's why we need to find an opening, ASAP.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Hmph... Where's a couple of Infected-turned-knights' wealth and privilege going to get you in this city?
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: All the money you spend on charity for these Infected, all the meaningless work to conceal them, dragging out their miserable lives in shacks and gutters.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: The city itself let you have all of this. You've got nothing close to an opening.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Ahaha, that's real hurtful to hear, Plastic Knight, sir.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: What about your family, then, Szewczyk? Didn't the knight nobles win all those entrepreneurs over for you, heart and soul?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: With the General Chamber of Commerce targeting you, you're no different from us. Take a long, hard look at yourself.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: ...Keh... fair enough, we're all trash smashed down to the dirt here. No real difference at all.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Your name was Greynuty? The knight nobility have been doomed since the moment all those years ago when the Retainers were established.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Don't tell me you hold onto any delusions about your old clan, little squirrel.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: (Did you think he'd go for an argument with you?)
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: You're calmer than I expected.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Keh. You know what, I'm dying to get out of this place. Heaven knows when you're going to pass that Oripathy around—
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: But seeing how you're not going to die for the next while, let's focus our attention on other matters—
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: The Armorless Union.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: The Chamber's scumbag lackeys. I'll give them something to regret.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: On that note, you're all so willing to face off with the Armorless... so you must have some ace up your sleeve, right?
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: ...Area 0.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Or in other words, the Grand Knight Territory's Infected assembly and treatment section. A place for Infected healthcare, formed by an alliance of several companies.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Aren't you Infected knights regulars in those parts? So you tell me. What secrets are the Armorless Union hiding there?
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: —Slow down, Szewczyk.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Of course we've got methods... but that doesn't mean we'll tell you about them just like that.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: If that's what you really thought, Infected, you would've left me in that wretched hospital and waited for the Armorless to come torture me for answers—you wouldn't have busted me out of there.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Don't you talk at me like this. We're only here now because we all did what we had to. Would your status alone give you the standing to address me, Ashlock?
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Or do you think your busting me out means I should be weeping over you with gratitude?
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: You arrogant noble—
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Uh—alright, alright, I'm not against you two fighting it out here and now. Better right this moment than a stab in the back after the Armorless Union shows up, anyway—
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: —We've been doing this for a few years now, for better or worse... we have ins with some government channels.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: There's the impoverished and Infected who can't even get by day-to-day, but do you know who else in Kazimierz hates the General Chamber of Commerce?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: ...Keh.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Either I've gone mad, or Kazimierz has. You couldn't be telling me a ragtag group of Infected are in deals with the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi to take down the K.G.C.C.?
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Ahaha...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Look at where you are in life. Look at the knights, Szewczyk.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: —They went mad forever ago.
attributes.name: Sona
